alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Jefferson; Johnson; Keokuk; Linn; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 1:14AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Keokuk, northwestern Johnson, southeastern Benton, northwestern Washington, northwestern Jefferson, southwestern Linn and Iowa Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 113 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ladora to 7 miles south of Eddyville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ladora around 120 AM CDT. Marengo around 125 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hedrick, Amana, Walford, Batavia, Martinsburg, Cedar Rapids, Ely, Swisher, Shueyville, Packwood and Abingdon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 205 and 239. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Iowa; Jefferson; Johnson; Keokuk; Linn; Washington
